result.title: Help me solve a problem
result.content:
I have a directed graph with no cycles where whenever a vertice is visited it is removed. Lets assume that a car starts from a random vertice and travels till it doesn't arrive to a deadend. What is the minimum number of cars to visit all vertices if we can choose the starting position and the path of each car?

EDIT: number of vertices<=1000, number of edges<=10000
